Quick and dirty render pkgdown asis

This will first run pkgdown::build_site then run rmarkdown::render to build the html pages. This is only relevant if the rmarkdown header contains an html output format that is not supported by pkgdown (e.g., ioslides, slidy). This will not work for pdf.

.asis(..., replacements, notOlderThan = NULL, cacheRepo = "docs/cache")

Contents

Developed by Eliot J B McIntire, Ceres Barros.

Site built with pkgdown.
